channel.title: After Countess hours i give up and ask for help
channel.description:
I have searched me client.java...and still i have not found anything to do with item stacking
Can someone please tell me
Ps. I have seen Item Stacking before with food and some other items, EG essace

item.title: After Countess hours i give up and ask for help
item.dc:creator: @icepick776 icepick776
item.description:
@icepick776 wrote:

hes right only you need to add it un a certain spot ill give an example::

FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(new File("data/stackable.dat")); while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) { if (c == 0) itemStackable[counter] = false; else itemStackable[counter] = true; counter++; } dataIn.close(); itemStackable[391] = true; itemStackable[4214] = true; } catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("Critical error while loading stackabledata! Trace:"); e.printStackTrace(); }

see where it says itemStackable[391] = true;

that means 391 or the itemid which is manta rays are now stackable

just add the itemstackable code after the dataIn.close()

be sure to make it = true other wise if =false it makes it unstackable

hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: After Countess hours i give up and ask for help

add in Item.java

itemStackable[ITEMID] = true;
